name: OR_LOG_NURS_NOTES
description: The OR_LOG_NURS_NOTES table contains the nursing notes from the log record.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the log record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: NURSING_NOTES_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the nursing notes which are associated with this log.
